Dog.synopsis: In SwA, Scratch speaks like a human. He doesn't have any kind of dog-like affectation, nor is he stupid - he's well-spoken, even when he's saying 'dog' things.Scratch, the dog a dead courier we met during our travels, appears in our camp at night, having retrieved something. We can engage in a little tug of war in order to see what he's fetched.
Dog.how_to_trigger: in reConoe fullcampClick on campsiteTalk to dog

Dog_3.speaker: Narrator
Dog_3.text: *The dog holds a well-chewed ball in his mouth.*
Dog_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch holds a ball in his mouth.

Dog_107.speaker: Scratch
Dog_107.text: All right. It's only fair that you enjoy it, too.
Dog_107.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drops the ball before speaking.

Dog_66.speaker: Scratch
Dog_66.text: But if you feel like throwing it - I wouldn't mind that at all.

Dog_23.speaker: Scratch
Dog_23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch looks sad, head bowed.InternalNodeContext: SFX only. Sad dog whine.

Dog_88.speaker: Player
Dog_88.text: Look him over for any signs of injury from the owlbear cub.

Dog_75.speaker: Narrator
Dog_75.text: *Nothing - he's fine. It seems the cub didn't attack Scratch, despite the sounds you heard in the night.*
Dog_75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player glances up and down. Scratch watches the player.

Dog_13.speaker: Player
Dog_13.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player petted Scratch before (to prevent approval spam)

Dog_97.speaker: Narrator
Dog_97.text: *Scratch's tongue lolls out happily, his tail wagging even faster.*

Dog_43.speaker: Narrator
Dog_43.text: *The dog pants through a ball held firmly in his mouth.*
Dog_43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch holds a ball in his mouth.

Dog_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog drops the ball on the ground

Dog_79.speaker: Narrator
Dog_79.text: *He relinquishes the ball. It is well-chewed and slick with drool.*

Dog_117.speaker: Narrator
Dog_117.text: *His eyes track the ball avidly. He shuffles on his paws, ready to chase after it...*

Dog_63.speaker: Scratch
Dog_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching the ball, eager to playNodeContext: A playful bark

Dog_127.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player wrestles with the dog and gets the ball

Dog_73.speaker: Scratch
Dog_73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Maintains his grip on the ball.

Dog_57.speaker: Player
Dog_57.text: Distract him with one hand and slip the ball from his jaws with the other.

Dog_39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player distracts the dog with one hand and slips the ball from his jaws

Dog_103.speaker: Player
Dog_103.text: Encourage him to drop the ball.

Dog_44.speaker: Scratch
Dog_44.text: It's certainly good to be back at camp! How I've missed the smells.

Dog_108.speaker: Player
Dog_108.text: All's well that ends well, eh, boy?

Dog_90.speaker: Player
Dog_90.text: I'm glad you're back where you belong.

Dog_106.speaker: Scratch
Dog_106.text: I just hope Dringo is fine. Mar'hyah has a mean streak.

Dog_82.speaker: Scratch
Dog_82.text: Indeed. And I'm sure Dringo will do a great job - he always took good care of me.

Dog_55.speaker: Scratch
Dog_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch looks happy, tail waggingNodeContext: SFX only. Happy dog bark

Dog_54.speaker: Scratch
Dog_54.text: It's not the same here. Feels emptier.
Dog_54.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Scratch looks sad, head bowed.InternalNodeContext: If the owlbear cub dies at somepoint after a relationship
has been estabplished between the two characters after their
camp night moment.

Dog_34.speaker: Scratch
Dog_34.text: The young cub. He's gone... for good.

Dog_69.speaker: Narrator
Dog_69.text: *The dog looks up at you, his eyes big and mournful.*

Dog_15.speaker: Player
Dog_15.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player petted Scratch before (to prevent approval spam)

Dog_86.speaker: Narrator
Dog_86.text: *The dog gives a soft whine of appreciation.*

Dog_38.speaker: Narrator
Dog_38.text: *You spot a name on the dog's collar - 'Scratch'.*

Dog_81.speaker: Narrator
Dog_81.text: *The dog is unable to speak through the small bag he holds in his mouth.*
Dog_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch holds a small bag in his jaws.

Dog_19.speaker: Scratch
Dog_19.text: I don't know. Maybe you can tell me. ([CAMP_Courier_Dog_FetchedItemDescription_50004d01-651b-a7ea-308a-451a9571cb85])
Dog_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drops the bag before speaking.

Dog_60.speaker: Scratch
Dog_60.text: All I know is I thought of you when I saw it.

Dog_40.speaker: Scratch
Dog_40.text: I didn't introduce myself before. You can call me Scratch.

Dog_121.speaker: Player
Dog_121.text: Look him over for any signs of injury from the owlbear cub.

Dog_24.speaker: Player
Dog_24.text: I heard you and the owlbear cub in the night - I thought something might've happened to you.

Dog_105.speaker: Scratch
Dog_105.text: No, nothing happened - just the young one having bad dreams. That's what you heard.
Dog_105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog's mouth is empty/he can talk as normal

Dog_10.speaker: Player
Dog_10.text: I hear you're friends with the owlbear cub.
Dog_10.context: InternalNodeContext: Option only available if the CFM was resolved on a later night by speaking to the cub first and later speaking to Scratch

Dog_1.speaker: Scratch
Dog_1.text: Yes! He's a handful, but I like having him around.
Dog_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog's mouth is empty/he can talk as normal

Dog_46.speaker: Scratch
Dog_46.text: I stay with him and keep him company when he's scared. He'll settle down, in time.
Dog_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog's mouth is empty/he can talk as normal

Dog_104.speaker: Player
Dog_104.text: I'm sorry about what happened to your master.

Dog_101.speaker: Scratch
Dog_101.text: Master, friend... I stayed with him until... until I knew he was gone.

Dog_16.speaker: Scratch
Dog_16.text: I'll never forget him, but I'm glad to have met you.

Dog_65.speaker: Player
Dog_65.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player petted Scratch before (to prevent approval spam)

Dog_20.speaker: Scratch
Dog_20.text: Oh - thank you. That's... that's nice.

Dog_25.speaker: Scratch
Dog_25.text: Here. I hope you like it. ([CAMP_Courier_Dog_FetchedItemDescription_50004d01-651b-a7ea-308a-451a9571cb85])
Dog_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drops the bag before speaking.

Dog_110.speaker: Narrator
Dog_110.text: *The dog wags his tail, a small bag clenched between his teeth.*
Dog_110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch holds a small bag in his jaws.

Dog_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player extends a palm expectantly. Scratch drops the bag and player picks it up

Dog_74.speaker: Narrator
Dog_74.text: *He gives in and surrenders his find to you.* ([CAMP_Courier_Dog_FetchedItemDescription_50004d01-651b-a7ea-308a-451a9571cb85])

Dog_122.speaker: Player
Dog_122.text: Reach forward and yank at it.

Dog_85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player yanks bag out of dog's mouth

Dog_33.speaker: Scratch
Dog_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog is still holding bag in mouthNodeContext: A playful growl.

Dog_120.speaker: Player
Dog_120.text: Extend a palm and wait expectantly.

Dog_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player holds out palm expectantly. A beat while dog wags tail.

Dog_119.speaker: Scratch
Dog_119.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch looks happy, tail waggingNodeContext: SFX only. Happy dog bark
